Detailed Description

MGDepthFunc defines a comparison function for depth test.

Depth test is used to judge a pixel drawn is visible or not, a kind of attributes of shading model.

Member Function Documentation

draw GLAttribute process.

Parameters:
no_color if true, color attribute will be neglected.

Implements MGGLAttrib.
